name: Panzer 205
description:
Join the Panzer Police and defend the fatherland.

Take control of your Sd.Kfz. 141 or Pz.Kp.Fw. (Panzer) III Ausf. M and defend the fatherland from waves of enemy tanks. Use your 50 mm Kwk39 cannon and penetrate the enemy armor with superior Pz. Gr. 39 APHE rounds that have unrivalled post-pen damage.

Tank no. 205 is an ACE number in tank warfare.

HE and APCR ammo types will be added in next update with more locations and enemy types. 

As always, see you on the battlefield, GLHF.
